thread.title: The painful secret Davey kept from Sam Frost
thread.title_full: The painful secret Davey kept from Sam Frost

title: The painful secret Davey kept from Sam Frost
text:
Email a friend 
EVICTED Bachelorette contestant Davey reveals he considered leaving the reality dating show to deal with the loss of two mates during filming. 
The larrikin bachelor, evicted from the show on Thursday after failing to win Sam’s heart, says the news made for one of his toughest times yet. 
“It was two completely different groups of mates and it happened within six days of each other,” he told AAP. 
“I had to Skype some of the boys and it was really difficult and I did contemplate leaving. 
“It was probably one of the toughest times of my life. 
“That was pretty emotional for me and it was just hard to be away from it all.” Despite what was happening in his private life, Davey says he kept the news quiet. Sam’s awkward date with Davey Lloyd and Tony. Source: Channel 10 
“I had Sam’s right intentions there, so I never told her what was happening because I didn’t want her to feel guilty,” he said. 
“But I also wanted to stay there for the right reason and not give up. 
“I was in a bit of a pickle and my head wasn’t in the right place, so to speak.” 
Davey says he was excited just to make it past the first night and did not rate his chances to win Sam’s affections. 
“As the time went on in the house I did start to feel for her a lot,” he admitted. 
“She’s an awesome girl. I was very intimidated by her at the start because she’s so gorgeous. 
“But I gave it my best and I was one of the youngest kids there. 
“I gave it a go, so I can be proud of myself.”
